author: Staff Reporter
text:
A student from minority community appearing for the SSLC exam in her mother tongue Urdu for the first time in the State in Government Girls Higher Secondary School in Krishnagiri on Tuesday. —Photo: N. Bashkaran

A total of 27,623 students appeared for the SSLC exams at 71 centres across the district here on Tuesday. The total number of candidates included 854 students appearing as private candidates, which included 55 differently-abled candidates.

A total of 400 candidates did not appear for the exams.

Earlier, Collector C.Kathiravan inspected the centres at the Government Boys Higher Secondary School and St. Annal Girls Higher Secondary School here.

In Dharmapuri, over 24,731 students appeared for the exams in 74 centres on Tuesday. The candidates included 805 private candidates.

On day one, 301 students failed to appear for the exams. Earlier, Collector K.Vivekanandan inspected exam centres here.
title: Over 27,600 students appear for SSLC exam in Krishnagiri
